title: Kimi no Na wa - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Adapted to Movie   Body Swap   Female to Male   Male to Female   Slow Romance   Time Skip
author: Makoto Shinkai
description: A girl stranded in a small lakeside village deep within the mountains, Mitsuha, and a boy caught up in the oddly orderly chaos of bustling Tokyo, Taki, begin to dream of another, unfamiliar life. Before long, they realize that they arenâ€™t dreaming at all, but actually switching bodies. Separated even further apart than they ever would have imagined, yet still somehow inexplicably connected, they search for the truth behind their strange phenomenon and discover what really happened on that fateful night when the stars rained from the sky.>
